mapper.select: SELECT a.SATELLITEID, a.ORBITID, a.SCENEID, a.PRODUCTID, b.ACTIVITYDEFNAME, b.BEGINTIME, b.FINISHTIME, b.`STATUS` FROM pp_t_scenetask a JOIN pp_t_sceneactivity b ON a.COMMTASKID = b.TASKID AND a.L1WFID = b.PROCESSINSTID AND b.FINISHTIME > #{lastFinishTime}

SELECT a.SATELLITEID, a.ORBITID, a.SCENEID, a.PRODUCTID, b.ACTIVITYDEFNAME, b.BEGINTIME, b.FINISHTIME, b.`STATUS` FROM pp_t_scenetask a JOIN pp_t_sceneactivity b ON a.COMMTASKID = b.TASKID AND a.L1WFID = b.PROCESSINSTID AND b.STATUS=2 AND b.BEGINTIME > #{lastRunningStartTime}
